caption: Remote Desktop Protocol Trait
description: RDP trait defines attributes shared by the RDP events.

certificate_chain.description: The list of observed certificates in an RDP TLS connection.

client.description: The client information in an RDP network connection.

request.description: The client request in an RDP network connection.

ref_event_name.description: The RDP event name (e.g. initial_request, initial_response, connect_request, connect_response, tls_handshake).
ref_event_name.caption: RDP Event Name

response.description: The server response in an RDP network connection.
